return-policy: Our return policy allows you to return items within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in their original condition with tags attached.
start-return: To start a return, you can visit our returns page [link to returns page]. You'll need your order number and the email address used for the purchase. Follow the instructions provided, and you'll receive a return label to send the item back to us.
store-hours: We are open from 8am to 5pm, Monday to Friday
